amendment.description: An amendment numbered 56 printed in Part B of House Report 118-261 to prohibit funding for the Department of Transportation's Climate Change Center.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Greene (GA) amendment (A026) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Greene (GA) amendment (A026) Agreed to by voice vote.
